role: LegalTech Intern | UI/UX Designer | Technical Assistant
desc: Led the UI designing and implementation of several websites for Rajah & Tann Technologies, their subsidiaries and side projects, ensuring that the design and interface was approved and satisfactory to key stakeholders.
Collaborated with RT&T's directors in proposing modules, content and lesson plans for their eLearning platform on cyber-hygiene and key practices.
Assisted the CTO in cyber-forensics crawling and extraction of data from devices from active legal cases with Axiom Magnet.
Work closely with frontend designers to understand user behaviours to build and maintain of new user-facing features and overhaul existing ones.
Independent testing of code written and ensuring they are up to expectations before handing over to the QA team.
Researching and execution of broad frontend architectural changes.
